value:
Here in Askr, I will finally be able to
have the quality time with my child
that I could not have before.

The Divine Dragons ruled Elyos for
generations from a place called the
holy land of Lythos.

The skies of Lythos and Askr may be
connected somehow. Whatever the
case, may peace reign under both.

I call upon the Emblems through the
power of prayer. How does your
summoning ability work, exactly?

What an interesting experience it is to
meet Heroes who are nearly identical
to the Emblems I know from Elyos.

I am the Divine Dragon Lumera. I am
here to pass along the best wishes of
your friend $Nf.

As a Divine Dragon, I must always
use my power responsibly.

If you desire it, then yes, I shall
become stronger.
Let us await the next opportunity.

I am honored to receive this gift.
I promise to use it well.

I am the Divine Dragon Lumera. I will
fight for you, in the interest of peace.
Is my child here too, by any chance?

Allow me to thank you from the
bottom of my heart for this wonderful
opportunity, $Nu.$k$pIn my own world, I know that I simply
would have perished. But here, I can
do so much more as a Hero.$k$pMy dreams can live on that much
longer. I now have time to laugh,
to cry...to be silly now and again.$k$pMost importantly, I can spend time
with the people I care about. And it
is all thanks to you.$k$pSo, as I fight for peace in Askr, I look
forward to more long talks like this
with you. Shall we call it a promise?
I am the Divine Dragon Queen!
The Emblems guide me.
Long have I waited.
Leave here at once!
I'm so sorry...
I hope I haven't kept you waiting.
Oh dear, is something the matter? Why don't we take a nice long walk, and you can tell me all about it?
I adore wildflowers. Do they bloom in this world as well?
If someone asked you the color of fire, what would you say? Red is the most obvious answer, but fire can be blue as well...
This garb has been the attire of the Divine Dragon Monarch for generations. I am honored to be wearing it.
I have not forgotten our promise, Alear. I will keep it, even in this new world.
I am certain the Emblems would answer your call. If you ever find yourself in possession of a ring, you need only say "Emblem Engage!"
Of course.
Yes, indeed.
I've been waiting for you.
